item.title: PlayStudio
item.description: About PlayStudio PlayStudio brand uses bold color, shape, and typography to express its brand attributes: energy, education, and fun. The main objective was to create a branding system that would be appealing and delightful to the kids, so that parents fall in love with it too. Web: PlayStudio website The logo, illustrations and color system are all inspired by the elements that toddlers usually play with: from building blocks, crayons and musical instruments to different shades of paint colors.

item.title: HomeAlone
item.description: The #WirVsVirus Hackathon The Federal German Government called for a two-day online hackathon in mid-March and received an overwhelming response rate of 40,000 initial participants out of which 28,361 people got actively involved and developed 1,500 solutions to fight against the Corona crisis. “ With over 28,000 participants: we have set up the world’s largest hackathon. ”, as Chancellery Minister Helge Braun emphasized./ Web: WirVsVirus - Der Hackathon der Bundesregierung - Corona / Covid-19

item.title: Helpal
item.description: The Team UX/UI: Jana Uvarova Illustrations: Jana Uvarova, free resources Front-end: Jana Uvarova, Dаnny Iаcono, Mаriken Vаn Gulpеn Back-end: Mаrkus Mеngel, Dаnny Iаcono Research & Idea Anyone who has ever moved to a new country knowns how it feels going through the process of arrival and the associated challenges. The research showed, that expats moving to Germany have to face excessively complicated bureaucracy in order to settle down and be able to work or study in the country.

item.title: Loop Now
item.description: About Loop Now Loop now is a product for continuous, automated employee feedback to increase productivity and boost employee engagement. It has four core functionalities: Agile OKR – Objective Management Direct and 360° feedback Regular employee surveys Team based feedback. Web: Loopline Systems marketing website Data-driven design Loop Now is designed to display a large amount of densely organized information in a easy-to-follow way. The UI focuses on presenting the data, it is clear and clean with an emphasis on typography, color, and shape.

item.title: Plantcare
item.description: Branding PlantCare’s typography and color are paired with a simple approach to content, creating an app that is exciting to explore, and easy to understand. Flow chart Wireframes Onboarding The onboarding process is a user’s first impression of the app. Clear and easy onboarding increases the likelihood of successful engagement with the app. It is also reffered to as the simple walkthroughs that introduce users to how an app can be used and which features it has.

item.title: Detective Dot
item.description: About Detective Dot Detective Dot - is a nine year old girl, developer by day, detective by night. In her quest to find the origins of everyday objects such as t-shirts and phones, Dot tells the very human story of where our possessions come from and many more fun stories. Web: Bright Little Labs website All rights are reserved by Bright Little Labs. Mission cards My task was to design new fun CIA (Children’s Intelligence Agency) mission cards for kids that would encourage them to think about the world around them.
